resources.string: I-Talkback inikeza impendulo ekhulunywayo ukuze usebenzise idivayisi yakho ngaphandle kokubheka isikrini. I-TalkBack ingaba wusizo kubantu abanobunzima bokubona isikrini.

Indlela yokusebenzisa i-TalkBack
• Swayiphela ngakwesokudla noma ngakwesobunxele ukuze uhambe phakathi kwezinto
• Thepha kabili ukuze wenze into isebenze

Indlela yokuvala i-TalkBack

Okhiye bevolumu: Cindezela futhi ubambe bobabili okhiye bevolumu amasekhondi ambalwa.

Amasethingi
1. Thepha okuthi Sebenzisa i-TalkBack. Kuzoba nomugqa wangaphandle oluhlaza kotshani. Wuthephe kabili.
2. Emyalezweni wokuqinisekisa, thepha okuthi Misa. Kuzoba nomugqa wangaphandle oluhlaza kotshani. Wuthephe kabili.
